Are stand-alone digital interventions for the self-management of thoughts, plans or acts of self-harm among persons with thoughts or plans of self-harm in the last month or acts of self-harm in the last year effective in reducing deaths from suicide, suicide attempts, acts and thoughts of self-harm?
